'''4J Studios''' (which stands for Jute, Jam, Journalism,{{note|This references the 3Js of Dundee; a symbolism of its culture and pays tribute to 4J's headquarter's location}} and Joysticks<ref>{{tweet|thevalkyrur|629654079590006785|@Wolf_GuySB @4JStudios Its Jute, Jam, Journalism (the 3J's of Dundee), and Joysticks!|August 7, 2015}}</ref>) is an independent game development studio based in {{w|Scotland}}, with offices in {{w|Dundee}} and {{w|Edinburgh}} (previously East Linton).<ref>[https://discord.com/channels/1212769882001776650/1367902548253741249/1396881214656483358 Just thought I'd let you guys know - we recently moved the East Linton team to Edinburgh, so the 4J Studios page should now say "with offices in Dundee and Edinburgh" ðŸ˜‡] by 4J Nathan, Reforj Discord</ref> The staff includes many former key personnel from defunct studio {{w|VIS Entertainment}}. It was founded by Paddy Burns and Chris van der Kuyl.<ref>{{Citation|url=https://4jstudios.com|title=4J Studios - Scottish award winning game development studio|author=4J Studios}}</ref> They are best known for developing the [[Legacy Console Edition|Legacy Console Edition]] of ''Minecraft''. Although Legacy Console Edition is now discontinued, 4J Studios continues to work with ''Minecraft'' as a [[Marketplace]] partner.<ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/marketplace/creator/4j-studios|title=Minecraft DLC Marketplace: Creators {{!}} Minecraft|website=[[Minecraft.net]]}}</ref> 4J Studios' current focus is developing their standalone game ''Reforj''.

== Games ==
4J Studios has developed the following games:
*''[[Xbox 360 Edition|Minecraft: Xbox 360 Edition]]'' (Xbox 360) (2012)
*''[[PlayStation 3 Edition|Minecraft: PlayStation 3 Edition]]'' (PS3) (2013)
*''[[PlayStation 4 Edition|Minecraft: PlayStation 4 Edition]]'' (PS4) (2014)
*''[[Xbox One Edition|Minecraft: Xbox One Edition]]'' (Xbox One) (2014)
*''[[PlayStation Vita Edition|Minecraft: PlayStation Vita Edition]]'' (PS Vita, PS TV) (2014)
*''[[Wii U Edition|Minecraft: Wii U Edition]]'' (Wii U) (2015)
*''[[Nintendo Switch Edition|Minecraft: Nintendo Switch Edition]]'' (Nintendo Switch) (2017)

They have ported/remade the following games to other consoles:
*''{{w|The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion}}'' (PS3) (2007)
*''{{w|Overlord: Raising Hell}}'' (PS3) (2008)
*''[[Banjo-Kazooie]]'' (Xbox 360) (2008)
*''{{w|Banjo-Tooie}}'' (Xbox 360) (2009)
*''[[Perfect Dark]]'' (Xbox 360) (2010)

4J Studios has developed the following original games:
*''{{w|Breeders' Cup World Thoroughbred Championships (video game)|Breeders' Cup World Thoroughbred Championships}}'' (Xbox, PS2) (2005)
*''{{w|Star Trek: Encounters}}'' (PS2) (2006)
*''{{w|Star Trek: Conquest}}'' (Wii, PS2) (2007)
*''{{w|AMF Bowling Pinbusters!}}'' (Nintendo DS) (2008)
*''{{w|Ducati Moto}}'' (Nintendo DS) (2008)
*''Wuggle'' (iOS) (2009)
*''Texas Wuggle'' (iOS) (2009)
*''Manic Mechanics'' (Nintendo Switch) (2023) (Windows, Xbox One, PS4) (2024)

4J Studios is working on the following games:
* ''[https://reforj.game Reforj]''

4J Studios has published the following original games:
*''Skye Tales'' (Windows, Nintendo Switch, PS4) (2023)
